sections.title: THE CHASSIS MATTERS
sections.content: Before you design anything, you understand what people are actually trying to build. That's where everything else comes from. A broken foundation breaks everything on top.

sections.title: CLARITY OVER BUZZWORDS
sections.content: Most people talk about this with design cosplay. Jargon masquerading as depth. Not useful.

sections.title: CUSTOM THINKING
sections.content: Each problem gets the approach it needs. Not the approach that's trendy or convenient.

engagement.title: Who I Work With
engagement.content:
- Founders building systems that need an architect.
- Complex domain leaders who need interfaces that reduce risk.
- Teams that need to bridge research and working prototypes.

engagement.title: How I Work
engagement.content:
- Deep evaluation of what you're actually trying to build.
- Custom approach. No templates.
- Async. Deep work. Not always-on availability.
